pr_title: [v4.7.3] Disable Fallback SCSV and add PHA to legacy SSLSocket

timeline.message:
Disable ENABLE_FALLBACK_SCSV for JCA compatibility

timeline.bodyText: would it makes sense to just comment this out and give explanation, so later someone who wishes to add this would know why?
